H3.text: who eliminated costa rica in world cup 2014. Netherlands

A4.text: Costa Rica faced the Netherlands in the quarter-finals of the 2014 World Cup.

A5.text: Costa Rica progressed to the quarter-finals after defeating Greece in the Round of 16.

A6.text: Costa Rica lost to the Netherlands in the quarter-finals of the 2014 World Cup on penalties.

A7.text: Costa Rica was a first-time quarter-finalist in the 2014 World Cup.
